Razor Claw stood unmoving, staring Wolveritron down.

"You don't fight back=
?" he glared at the deserter HOPING FOR A RESPONSE.

"You do not fight then=
 you admit your guilt." he drew his sword and swung it in a backslashing mo=
tion at a level to decapitate Wolveritron.


  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, Febru=
ary 01, 2001 9:31 PM
  Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


  Razor Claw=
 stands up straight, looking toward Prime. "Stay out of this, you are not p=
art of the accused or a viable witness so you have no say in what happens t=
o these deserters."

  The mutant wasn't exactly what bots would consider s=
ane. he was injected with a virus to stabilize his double transformation bu=
t was only given one sequence to key upon. Maybe it was the virus, maybe it=
 was his injuries, or maybe the former Pred was just sickened by bots who'd=
 run from a battle and leave thier comrades to suffer the pains of battle.
=

  "Now for business I was dealing with you!" he reached out and poked Wolv=
eritron in the chestplate trying to pursue his issues.


    ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
    From: dachande 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sen=
t: Thursday, February 01, 2001 1:57 PM
    Subject: Re: Dachande respond or=
 else


    ::Optimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
     
        They =
had not heard Razor Claw ask them to stop, but they heard him the second ti=
me. Prime was walking away, but he stopped and came back.
        "Is there=
 something you need from us?" Prime asked.
      ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: T=
hursday, February 01, 2001 10:22 AM
      Subject: Re: Dachande respond or =
else


      It all started back when...


         ----- Original Message =
----- 
        From: dachande 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent=
: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
        Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, =
and Ramus


        ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
         
            The=
y had heard the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in th=
e conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, an=
d togther they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away

      =
  So I responded with...
        . 
        Razor Claw saw the three bots l=
eaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance membe=
rs. he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased=
 the three until they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to r=
obot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you will=
 be forced to, your choice."

        Then a few more posts of Razor Claw t=
racking them until finally Optimus Prime (Razor Claw doesn't know enough ab=
out Prime to recognise him) Wolveritron, Ramus, and Eclipse were finally to=
gether. and Razor Claw caught up with them.(I can't find the cave posting I=
 thought it was those three that were in the same cave as Vuloise.)

      =
  He aproached the three bots ready for battle and hoping that things won't=
 be ended peacefully






          Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
         
     =
